item.title: The Argument That Video Games Spur Mass Shootings Is Losing Steam
item.description: Article Info Authors: Cecilia D’Anastasio Date: June 17, 2022 Popular Source: The Argument That Violent Video Games Spur Mass Shootings Is Losing Steam - Bloomberg Quotes/thoughts “In addition to “broken families” and “declining church attendance,” he said, “desensitizing the act of murder in video games” has contributed to the epidemic of mass shootings.
